parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: From a derivative of mneme; to exercise memory, i.e. Recollect; by implication, to punish; also to rehearse.

parse: Article - Genitive Masculine Singular
str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Noun - Genitive Masculine Singular
str2: From lego; something said; by implication, a topic, also reasoning or motive; by extension, a computation; specially, the Divine Expression.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Genitive Masculine Singular
str2: Who, which, what, that.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Adverb
str2: No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.

parse: Noun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: (a) (as adj.) enslaved, (b) (as noun) a (male) slave. From deo; a slave.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.

parse: Adjective - Nominative Masculine Singular - Comparative
str2: Large, great, in the widest sense.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Noun - Genitive Masculine Singular
str2: Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.

parse: Conjunction
str2: If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To pursue, hence: I persecute. A prolonged form of a primary verb dio; to pursue; by implication, to persecute.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To pursue, hence: I persecute. A prolonged form of a primary verb dio; to pursue; by implication, to persecute.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Conjunction
str2: And, even, also, namely.

parse: Conjunction
str2: If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From teros; to guard, i.e. To note; by implication, to detain; by extension, to withhold; by extension, to withhold.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Noun - Accusative Masculine Singular
str2: From lego; something said; by implication, a topic, also reasoning or motive; by extension, a computation; specially, the Divine Expression.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From teros; to guard, i.e. To note; by implication, to detain; by extension, to withhold; by extension, to withhold.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 2nd Person Plural
str2: Your, yours. From humeis; yours, i.e. Pertaining to you.

parse: Conjunction
str2: And, even, also, namely.
